section.p: This appendix describes the controller configuration settings as stored in the bssapp database. For details on how to update them, refer to and .

section.title: CONTROLLER_ID
section.p: The identifier of the service controller. This setting cannot be changed.

section.title: BSS_ORGANIZATION_ID
section.p: The ID of the organization in responsible for the service controller. The organization must have the technology provider role. It is created and initially assigned to the Azure service controller by the platform operator.

section.title: BSS_USER_ID
section.p: The identifier of the user specified in BSS_USER_KEY for accessing .

section.title: BSS_USER_KEY
section.p: The user key for accessing . You receive this key with the confirmation email for your user account. The user must have the technology manager role in and belong to the technology provider organization responsible for the service controller.
It is recommended that the user account is used only for carrying out actions on behalf of the service controller in .

section.title: BSS_USER_PWD
section.p: The password of the user for accessing .
